item.title: Looking for 2d Stick Figure Animator - Upwork
item.description:
I’m looking for an experienced animator to join my production team on a growing youtube channel.

Duties:
You’ll be given a voice-over audio file and a script with detailed animator instructions. Your job will be to create stick figure drawings, scenes, and animations to produce an engaging and fun-to-watch video.

Requirements to Apply:

- Adobe Animate, Premiere Pro
- Good English communication skills
- Artistic ability to copy a specific style of illustration
- Ability to draw quickly for a quick turnaround
- Attention to detail
- Good communication
- Be willing to ask questions to clarify instructions if you don’t understand
- Turn in work on time

The videos will need to be in a similar style as below.:

https://youtu.be/peVsSYsijV4?si=_tlpM3Jy6t_v4TSB
https://youtu.be/nV6ZvNDb7pI?si=Vylz-j_l-jgb_6Sg
https://youtu.be/7mF-fzJrhtU?si=ttp2iJ5nw8q2t7Sh

Application Process:
- Submit your application with examples of work.
- A sample will be required in the next step.

Start your application with “Stickman” to ensure that you have read the job post fully. We will share further requirements in the next stage.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 29, 2024 14:02 UTC
Category: 2D Animation
Skills:Animated Explainer, Adobe Animate, Animation, 2D Animation, Video Editing, Explainer Video, Motion Graphics
Skills: Animated Explainer, Adobe Animate, Animation, 2D Animation, Video Editing, Explainer Video, Motion Graphics
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: VIdeo editor for Facebook ads - Upwork
item.description:
We are an e-commerce company looking for a video editor that will create Facebook video ad creatives and help us grow our brand. The editor will be responsible for creating videos based on our current ad templates as well as create and test new creatives and approaches.

Tasks
- Creating 2 video creatives per day with 4-5 hook variations - about 20-30s long, can be delivered in batches or every day
- Ideating and looking for ways to improve our ads and sales with better creatives and hooks
- Utilise UGC to create ad creatives
- Keep on the lookout for great ads in the same niche and improve based on their winners

Other
- General ecom knowledge (eg language and acronyms used)
- High level spoken and written English is a must
- Have an eye for what's trending and trendy

Please share your previous experience related to these requirements as well as your rate.

All shortlisted candidates will be invited for a video call interview.

Budget: $1,500
Posted On: June 29, 2024 13:57 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:CapCut, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Social Media Marketing
Skills: CapCut, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Social Media Marketing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Long-form and Short Editing - Upwork
item.description:
Editing videos for a product review channel.

The amount of videos will total:
12 Long Form (6-8min) videos in landscape
12 Short Form (60 sec or under) videos in portrait

The editing is minimal including cutting up presenter's walkthrough to make sense, adding minimal titles and fixing any color or audio mistakes.

Bonus if you can add copyright free music to some and provide the license for these songs.

The expectation would be that each video takes an hour or less to edit and would be completed and returned within 24 hours receiving the footage.

The Video's will be similar to the ones posted on https://www.youtube.com/@WillItCamp

Please send only a couple examples that are close to this style for review and please answer the following questions:

What editing platform do you use?
What experience do you have editing video remotely?
Can you create thumbnails as well? If so, can you please send a couple examples?


Hourly Range: $11.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 29, 2024 13:53 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Audio Editing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Audio Editing, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States

item.title: 🛑 Earn $5 for 1 Minute of Work, Give Opinions About Products You Already Own - Upwork
item.description:
The easiest, quick cash job ever!

If you have items in your home that cost more than $50, I want to pay you $5 to give your opinion about the product in a simple 1-3 minute video using your phone or ipad.

You already paid money for the item. You might as well get $5 for giving your opinion about it. It's like getting a $5 rebate for items in your home. (You do NOT need to show your face in the video)

Quick Summary of this Job:
[+] You MUST SHOWCASE the product.
[+] Talk about its features and what you like about it.
[+] Show how to use the product.
[+] The video must be 1-3 minutes long.

Product Requirements:
[+] Each product must cost $50 or more with 1,000 stars or more
[+] NO food, No snacks, No Supplements, No health-related products.
[+] Looks "almost" new; original packaging not required.
[+] No scratches, No dents, No fading colors.

Video Requirements
[+] You do NOT need to show your face
[+] Use your voice, not some AI, robot voice
[+] Video camera or iPad Video (1920 x 1080 pixels)
[+] No shakey videos. Use a tripod to hold your device.
[+] Good lighting to see the product.
[+] Product should be COMPLETELY inside the video view area, not cut off at the edges.
[+] No other items should be in the video (Not your pet, not your child)

Donts (Things you should NOT do)
[+] Don't download videos from YouTube or TikTok to sell to me. I have software to detect this, and I will report you to Upwork.
[+] Don't try to sell the product in the video. Just highlight the features and how to use the product.
[+] Don't speak negatively about the product.

How to Get Started
[+] Submit a list of product links you want to give your opinion about BEFORE making the video. Each product must cost $50 or more with 500 stars or more.
[+] Only submit 10 product links as a test until instructed to submit more than 5. I want to ensure you can follow directions before making dozens of videos.

After You Create the Videos
[+] I will send you a Google Link to Upload the videos.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 29, 2024 13:38 UTC
Category: Data Entry
Skills:Data Entry, English, Content Writing, Creative Writing, Writing, Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Copywriting, Video Editing
Skills: Data Entry, English, Content Writing, Creative Writing, Writing, Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Copywriting, Video Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Youtube Video Editor needed | Finance Blitz - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description
Frequency: 1 video per month
Delivery Time: max 20 days
Price Per Video: $120

Hey, we are Finance Blitz. We make finance/business documentaries, and we explain financial concepts through ca 8-minute stories.

We are looking for a professional YouTube video creator/editor to join our team.

You will need to put together 8-10-minute videos from stock videos/footage and cuts from movies/news, that would go parallel with the script. Videos should keep viewers engaged with good pacing, on-screen writing, transitions, 2d motion graphics/on-screen animations. Add in on-screen writings, copyright-free sound effects/background music where applicable. A paid subscription to a stock website is a must (e.g. Storyblocks, Artgrid, etc).

Please provide samples when applying. We expect to achieve a high quality similar to the samples below:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5jjdErDkDZE

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tveVWnS36Nk


Please note that applications without samples will not be reviewed. Be advised, If you provide a false portfolio and fail to meet the promised quality, you'll get a low rating and an explanation comment. If you have read the job ad and checked the links write "apple" in your message.

Cheers!

Budget: $120
Posted On: June 29, 2024 13:33 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: Germany
click to apply

item.title: Looking for Video editor for old celebrities and Hollywood stars YouTube channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a simple video editor who can do the following:
- Find relevant footage or pictures for the video
- Add effects such as transitions, lower thirds and overlays
- Make an engaging video

To provide a clear idea of the type of content we aim to produce, please take a moment to view the following examples:

https://www.youtube.com/@PrimeDiscovery-jp1gj

We kindly request that you watch a few videos on the sample channels to grasp the specific style of video editing we're seeking.

The video will be around 20 - 25 minutes long.

Payment: $20 per video
We will be looking for turnaround times of 24h - 48h
